safire.learning.interfaces.pretraining_model_handle module¶

class safire.learning.interfaces.pretraining_model_handle.PretrainingModelHandle(model_instance, pretrain)[source]¶

Bases: object

Provides the train/validate/test handle for a learner class. This is, so far, just a wrapper for the model plus output of the ModelClass.setup() function.

A handle is the “runnable” interface to a model.
